briefTitle: Study of KW-0761 Versus Vorinostat in Relapsed/Refractory CTCL
officialTitle: Open-Label, Multi-Center, Randomized Study of Anti-CCR4 Monoclonal Antibody KW-0761 (Mogamulizumab) Versus Vorinostat in Subjects With Previously Treated Cutaneous T-Cell Lymphoma
summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the progression free survival of KW-0761 versus vorinostat for subjects with relapsed or refractory CTCL.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From date of randomization at every visit until the date of first documented progression or date of death from any cause, whichever came first, assessed up to 36 months
